summary: The code executes unloadroot.sh, creates a directory fs/lower with permissions 777, and bind-mounts the root filesystem at fs/lower for read-only access.

details.comment: The code executes unloadroot.sh, creates a directory fs/lower with permissions 777, and bind-mounts the root filesystem at fs/lower for read-only access.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
./unloadroot.sh
sudo mkdir fs/lower
sudo chmod 777 fs/lower
sudo mount --bind -r / fs/lower/
